examples: I felt so bad I went to see my doctor

definitions.text: (Roman Catholic Church) a title conferred on 33 saints who distinguished themselves through the orthodoxy of their theological teaching
examples: the Doctors of the Church greatly influenced Christian thought down to the late Middle Ages

definitions.text: children take the roles of physician or patient or nurse and pretend they are at the physician's office
examples: the children explored each other's bodies by playing the game of doctor

definitions.text: a person who holds Ph.D. degree (or the equivalent) from an academic institution
examples: she is a doctor of philosophy in physics

definitions.text: alter and make impure, as with the intention to deceive
restore by replacing a part or putting together what is torn or broken
